SEARCH
Package com.flights.objects

Class Booking

java.lang.Object
com.flights.util.DBConnectivity
com.flights.objects.Booking
public class Booking extends DBConnectivity
Booking object containing everything needed to create, read, update or remove a booking from database

      public static boolean verifyBookingDetails(String bookingID, String email)
      Verify does the booking exist in database
      Parameters:
      bookingID - the booking no
      email - the booking email
      Returns:
      true if exists, false otherwise

      Adds passengers to the booking

    • updateDatabase

      public void updateDatabase()
      Updates the database with the booking details
      Automatically detects is it a new or existing booking and updates the database accordingly
      Also updates its child Passenger and Seat objects database entries, use this method ONLY to update the database
      Specified by:
      updateDatabase in class DBConnectivity

    • deleteEntry

      public void deleteEntry()
      Deletes the booking and all related objects from the database
      This action is IRREVERSIBLE

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Get all booking details for debug purposes
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String containing all booking details and all child objects details
